name: easy worsted hat & scarf set
sizes_available: medium and large hat, one size scarf
notes:
**download two forever free easy to knit patterns in one. a hat and a matching scarf. do me a favor and add the pattern(s) to your faves, i would appreciate it. happy knitting and do share your finished projects with us by making a project page.**

> these two projects were part of yarnz2go's 
> mystery bags for the holidays and
> there are a few knit kits 40% off left. if you
> want to grab one visit **[here][1]**.

**both are easy knits~** :yarn: 
a fun and easy to knit in the round hat with a bit of an extra interest in a five stitch detail for as shown medium size 8” in height, 18.5” around the ribbing. the large size measures 10“ in height, 20.5“ around the ribbing. no bind oﬀ, just an easy way to finish the decreased crown. the pattern is entirely written.

the matching scarf is knitted flat, growing and decreasing at the beginning and again at the end, showing a pretty eyelet detail along one side. the scarf measures 72" in length and 4.5" in width. written pattern.

**yarn** the yarn used for both projects is a washable (good thing) worsted weight so this is a quick knit. the pom is included in the complete set and/or hat knit kit at **[yarnz2go][2].**

**notions needed**  us size 7 (4.5 mm) circular needle 16”, (42 cm) in length.
stitch marker for the hat.
tapestry needle or crochet hook for finishing.

**gauge**  16 sts and 23 rows in 4” of stockinette stitch.

happy knitting!
